text: Crime and Punishment () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Kulidzhanov.В Москве простились с народным артистом Георгием ТараторкинымПреступление и наказание It stars Georgy Taratorkin, Innokenty Smoktunovsky, and Tatyana Bedova. ==Actors== * Georgy Taratorkin as Rodion Romanovich Raskolnikov * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Porfiry Petrovitch * Tatyana Bedova as Sonya Marmeladova * Victoria Fyodorova as Avdotya Romanovna * Yefim Kopelyan as Svidrigailov * Yevgeni Lebedev as Marmeladov * Maya Bulgakova as Yekaterina Ivanovna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 crime movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970s crime drama movies Category:Russian crime movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Lev Kulidzhanov
title: Crime and Punishment (1970 movie)
